A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
First star wars ever that I'm not keen to sit through a second time. This movie was a slap in the face to anyone who likes the original trilogy.

Doubt if Johnson has even seen a star wars movie (claims he had but clearly doesn't understand it).

The worst part is this is meant to be a trilogy but The Last Jedi doesn't continue any of the plot points from Force Awakens! It's like Johnson just decided he didn't like JJ's movie so he's going in a different direction.

Be warned if you were looking for them to answer some of the questions from TFA then you'll be disappointed.

CGI and effects are great\, probably the best the series has ever seen. Director can shoot a scene... just can tell a good story.

So many plot holes and stupid ideas. Doesn't work as a sequel. Too long (never thought I'd say that about a SW movie). Full plot arcs that could have been cut. AND WTF HAVE YOU DONE TO LUKE! YOU SHOULD BE ASHAMED.

Hands down worst SW movie by Far.

Advise you not to see it\, wait for netflix.

This is not the Star Wars movie you were looking for. Move along.
